类的使用
org.springframework.beans.factory.xml.XmlBeanDefinitionReader

  • 使用XmlBeanDefinitionReader的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.beans.factory.groovy
    Support package for Groovy-based bean definitions.
    org.springframework.beans.factory.xml
    Contains an abstract XML-based BeanFactory implementation, including a standard "spring-beans" XSD.
    org.springframework.context.support
    Classes supporting the org.springframework.context package, such as abstract base classes for ApplicationContext implementations and a MessageSource implementation.
    org.springframework.web.context.support
    Classes supporting the org.springframework.web.context package, such as WebApplicationContext implementations and various utility classes.

    • org.springframework.beans.factory.groovy中XmlBeanDefinitionReader的使用

      参数类型为XmlBeanDefinitionReader的org.springframework.beans.factory.groovy中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      GroovyBeanDefinitionReader(XmlBeanDefinitionReader xmlBeanDefinitionReader)
      Create a new GroovyBeanDefinitionReader based on the given XmlBeanDefinitionReader, loading bean definitions into its BeanDefinitionRegistry and delegating Groovy DSL loading to it.

    • org.springframework.beans.factory.xml中XmlBeanDefinitionReader的使用

      返回XmlBeanDefinitionReader的org.springframework.beans.factory.xml中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      XmlBeanDefinitionReader XmlReaderContext.getReader()
      Return the XML bean definition reader in use.
      参数类型为XmlBeanDefinitionReader的org.springframework.beans.factory.xml中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      XmlReaderContext(Resource resource, ProblemReporter problemReporter, ReaderEventListener eventListener, SourceExtractor sourceExtractor, XmlBeanDefinitionReader reader, NamespaceHandlerResolver namespaceHandlerResolver)
      Construct a new XmlReaderContext.

    • org.springframework.context.support中XmlBeanDefinitionReader的使用

      返回XmlBeanDefinitionReader的org.springframework.context.support中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      XmlBeanDefinitionReader GenericXmlApplicationContext.getReader()
      Exposes the underlying XmlBeanDefinitionReader for additional configuration facilities and loadBeanDefinition variations.
      参数类型为XmlBeanDefinitionReader的org.springframework.context.support中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected void AbstractXmlApplicationContext.initBeanDefinitionReader(XmlBeanDefinitionReader reader)
      Initialize the bean definition reader used for loading the bean definitions of this context.
      protected void AbstractXmlApplicationContext.loadBeanDefinitions(XmlBeanDefinitionReader reader)
      Load the bean definitions with the given XmlBeanDefinitionReader.

    • org.springframework.web.context.support中XmlBeanDefinitionReader的使用

      参数类型为XmlBeanDefinitionReader的org.springframework.web.context.support中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected void XmlWebApplicationContext.initBeanDefinitionReader(XmlBeanDefinitionReader beanDefinitionReader)
      Initialize the bean definition reader used for loading the bean definitions of this context.
      protected void XmlWebApplicationContext.loadBeanDefinitions(XmlBeanDefinitionReader reader)
      Load the bean definitions with the given XmlBeanDefinitionReader.
